name: Zombie Castle (CrazyFisch)
description:
This is my submition for the VR Jan Jam by Justin P Barnett.
Theme: Escape Room

Escape a dark castle full of zombies in an action loaded puzzle adventure ;D

Made on and for PC on the Valve Index.
It should be compatible with all sorts of Devices using  the Open XR Plugin.

Edit: Added APK Version (20min past & probably not gonna work).

Have fun !

-----------------------------------

Left Joystick -> Move, Run

Right Joystick -> Look around, duck, stand up

Right Primary Button -> Jump

Double Right Secondary Button -> Reclaim your weapon

Left Secondary Button -> Settings

(In settings) Hold Left Primary Button -> reset to last savepoint (might produce error)

Grip Action to grab

Trigger Action to shoot
-----------------------------------
